resources.string: Hello Anybody that is paying attention!
Do you want to turn location on?
Type in the place you want to go
This page_is so select you mode of transportation which currently is on CAR
This page is so select you mode of transportation which currently is on BUS
This page is so select you mode of transportation which currently is on WALKING
This button will get the random result based on your choice of transportation
Here is the result page of your search
This here is the name of the restaurant
Click this to add the current restaurant to your favorites list and you will see it appear on the map!
Don\'t like certain foods? Use the filter to fine tune your choices.
Interested in alcohol? Checkout out our Untappd feed or you can find them on the map also.
